name: @eugene_jao/simplezip.js
description: Lightweight uncompressed browser-compatible ZIP generation, supported file name encoded by utf-8

scripts.build: tsc && browserify lib/index.js --standalone SimpleZip -o build/simplezip.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output build/simplezip.min.js build/simplezip.js

author: eugene_jao
